short_summary: An annual Human Resources (HR) research and advisory services subscription.
description: The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) has a requirement for the award of an annual Human Resources (HR) research and advisory services subscription. The contract is expected to be for a period of one year, plus four irrevocable option(s), allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract(s) by one-year each.
duration_in_months: The start date is not specified, but the expected end date is 31 July 2024.
full_summary:
### **Human Resources (HR) Research and Advisory Services Subscription**
#### **Request for Proposal**
The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) is seeking a proposal for an annual Human Resources (HR) research and advisory services subscription.
#### **Contract Details**
* **Contract Term:** 1 year (July 28, 2023 to July 31, 2024)
* **Options:** 4 (1-year) irrevocable options to extend the contract term
* **Estimated Quantity of Commodity:** Not Applicable
#### **Notice Details**
* **Solicitation Number:** 20221921
* **Publication Date:** January 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 28, 2023 at 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** February 24, 2023
* **Trade Agreements:** Eligible under various international trade agreements including the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement and various Canada-centric trade agreements.
#### **Documents**
View the full tender notice [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/20/7d837e4ea29130b257c3e545266b76e1/amd002_-_rfp_20221921_-_hr_research_and_advisory_services_subscription.pdf) or [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/15/be1a10bdc4464e98e6ec68e62946c3bd/questions_and_answers_no._2_for_rfp_20221921.pdf) for a list of additional documents.
